meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Laura McLean Garan Geist Maryann Penzvalto Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7708.

td.p: Laura McLean, a data analyst from Nashville, Tennessee
Garan Geist, a strategy consultant from Chicago, Illinois
Maryann Penzvalto, a librarian from Cleveland, Ohio (whose 2-day cash winnings total $28,602)

tr.td: SOME SERIOUS FOREIGN COIN
4 OF THE SAME VOWEL, ONE WORD
FALSE OR MISLEADING
MARCH MADNESS CHAMPS
TOP SEEDS
RACKET BUSTERS
